title: Data Ownership
description: Gives individuals full control of their personal health records (PHRs) within a secure, decentralized network.

title: Decentralized AI
description: Transforms healthcare with a secure, scalable peer-to-peer federated learning (FL) network for AI model training on encrypted data.

title: Direct Rewards
description: Enables peer-to-peer data monetization, allowing individuals to earn stablecoin rewards directly without intermediaries.
